awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of a Fully Automated, Five Spectrometer ElectronMicroanalyzer
awd_abstract_narration: Funds are requested to acquire a fully automated,                       multispectrometer electron probe micronalayzer to be used for                   research in the Department of Geology and Mineralogy at Ohio                    State University.  The microprobe is required for analysis of                   minerals, rocks and other geological materials and is an                        essential tool for modern research in petrology, mineralogy,                    crystallography, geochemistry, economic geology, and                            paleomagnetic studies.  Ohio State University has a large                       number of active researchers in these and othere areas of                       research who presently have no access to an electron microprobe.

inst.inst_name: Ohio State University Research Foundation -DO NOT USE
